data.eml:eml: Two new species of protoplophorid mites (Acari: Oribatida: Protoplophoridae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fuangarworn, Marut (2011): Two new species of protoplophorid mites (Acari: Oribatida: Protoplophoridae) from Thailand. Zootaxa 2732: 59-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200725
